name: Precise Techno
overview:
Established in the year 2006, we, “Precise Techno Cast Pvt. Ltd.”, are an ISO 9001:2008 certified firm, which is engaged in manufacturing, supplying and exporting a wide range of Industrial Valves Body, Automotive Component, Cryogenic Casting, Architectural Hardware Fitting, Door Fitting Accessories and many more.

Objective: On time delivery Maintaining customer - supplier chain, from beginning towards continuous improvement Manufacturing quality product at optimum cost Reduction in rejection & rework Process control & improvement of design and development of new techniques ensuring best quality

Our Team: Experienced and qualified engineers Technicians Quality controllers Research analysts Warehousing experts Marketing representatives Skilled labors

Our Quality Assurance: We aim at offering a quality assured range of Industrial Valves Body, Automotive Component, Cryogenic Casting, Architectural Hardware Fitting, Door Fitting Accessories and many more to our clients. For this, we make sure to use high-grade raw-material such as CF8, CF8M, CF3, CF3M, WCB, EN-SERIES, Carbon Steel CA- 15, CA - 40, CB7CU -1&2 (17-4-PHI, Duramet, Agronite, Nast Alloy, Monel, cz-100.

Our Infrastructure: Based in Rajkot, Gujarat, India, we have developed a sound infrastructure, which is spread across a wide area. Divided into various departments, this infrastructure ensure streamlined flow of business related activities. Our infrastructure is also well-equipped with advanced machines and tools that help in remaining in tandem with international standards and norms.

Casting Composition: Foundry equipped with most sophisticated equipments/machinery for pattern injection, shell production, melting fettling for production capacity of 40 mt/month Sand blasting, leaching, acid pickling and electro polishing facilities.
